name: casino-game
description: A full-stack poker game with AI-powered bots

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && pnpm dev" "cd server && pnpm dev"
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd client && pnpm install && cd ../server && pnpm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: cd client && pnpm build && cd ../server && pnpm build
